name: INRequestPaymentCurrencyAmountUnsupportedReason
desc: Constants indicating the reason for being unable to resolve the currency amount.

items.name: case paymentsAmountBelowMinimum
items.desc: The payment amount is below the minimum transfer amount established by your app.

items.name: case paymentsAmountAboveMaximum
items.desc: The payment amount exceeds the maximum transfer amount allowed by your app for the user.

items.name: case paymentsCurrencyUnsupported
items.desc: The payment currency is not supported by your app.
